Summary: a star- or planet-like point of light in the predawn sky, moving slowly from high western sky approximately northward
divs: sighting detailsi rose for work this morning at 6am, as usual. at about 6:30am, i went out my back (kitchen) door and down the steps off my deck, with two of my dogs so they could potty. i don't remember a visible moon, and only my back porch light was on, as well as a street light in front of my house. it was cool out (my breath was visible), so i looked up expecting a clear sky, which was the case. i live in a remote area, which makes for good stargazing. also, while it was still dark out, it was beginning to get light in the east. at this time, i saw what i thought was a bright star or planet, in the western sky near celestial north. after a couple of seconds, i realized it was moving. i maintained my gaze on the object, with the naked eye, as it moved slowly north or northeast (it's hard to tell precisely, as my road does not run true north-south), and lost it in the treeline 1-2 minutes later. (i should note we get very little air traffic over my house, except for small, low-flying private planes and the occasional life flight helicopter. we do live about 25 miles north of grissom reserve air base.) at first, i dismissed it as a plane. then i realized there were no flashing or colored lights as on a plane or helicopter. also, i saw nothing resembling a comet tail or contrail. it was impossible to judge mass or distance of the object. the path of motion seemed to be ballistic, and i saw no accel\decel, stopping, or turning of the object. the was no perceptible helicopter or plane\jet sound, though i do have a small dam on my property which provides background noise. i've seen shooting stars before, and this was not one of them. i doubted i'd be able to see a satellite or the iss under these conditions, with the naked eye. after a few minutes, i returned inside and resumed my morning routine, mentioning the sighting to my wife who, while not as intrigued by these things as i, has an open mind, and said something like, "hmm, that's interesting." i am a healthy, middle-aged white male with no criminal history, or history of mental illness or illegal drug use. while credulous, i also like to think of myself as an intellectual with good critical thining skills. i am a cad engineer by trade. i hope this report is of some use to you. feel free to contact me with any further questions.
trends: There have been no other sightings in athens
This sighting has never been favorited.
